DOC.brief_summary: To determine normative range Insulin-like Growth Factor 1 ( IGF-1 ) , Insulin-like growth factor-binding protein 3 ( IGFBP-3 ) , Acid-Labile Subunit ( ALS ) accord age , sex pubertal stage healthy paediatric Spanish population .
DOC.brief_title: IGF-1 , IGFBP3 , ALS Normative Ranges Healthy Pediatric Spanish Population
DOC.criteria: Children either sex Caucasian parent Age : newborn include 18 year age Length/height , weight body mass index ( BMI ) within mean +/ 2SD ( Standard Deviation ) accordance growth chart 2010 Spanish crosssectional growth study ( Carrascosa Lezcano et al 2010 ) Signed consent least one parent legal guardian ( subject ≤18 year ) subject ≥12 year Early advance puberty ( pubertal sign : 8 9 year old girl , 9 10 year old boy ) , delay puberty ( puberty onset ≥ 13 yearold girl , ≥ 14 yearold boy ) Chronic diseases include , limited , endocrinologic disease , chromosomal disease , chronic disease renal , hepatic and/or cardiac aetiology , tumour process An acute disease last two week prior recruitment Any clinically significant outofrange lab value Healthy paediatric volunteer medical treatment ( contraception permit ) A family history short stature ( either parent < P3 ) Children bear small gestational age ( birth weight , length , head circumference < P10 ) Adopted child conceive vitro fertilization ( IVF ) Subjects unwilling unable opinion investigator sponsor undergo study procedure
